titleStmt.title: Twelve qveries humbly presented to the serious consideration of the high court of Parliament. About the two soule-oppressing yokes of a forced maintenance and ministry, that have more oppressed the consciences of the knowing and godly people of this nation, then all the tyranny either of the king or bishops beside.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Howes in Popes-Head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
